name: kanba
description: Kanba is a kanban style project and task management application with multi user support. It lets teams organize boards, track work in progress and comment on tasks, offering a Trello like experience on self hosted infrastructure.
features: Kanban Boards: Visual task management with drag-and-drop cards and multiple boards. Organize work Trello-style.
Team Collaboration: Multi-user support with task comments and activity tracking. Coordinate team projects effectively.
Task Management: Labels, tags, due dates, and assignees for comprehensive task tracking. Monitor work in progress with clarity.
Board Templates: Pre-configured board layouts for common workflows and project types. Start projects faster.
Card Attachments: Upload files and images directly to task cards. Keep all project assets in one place.
Activity Feed: Real-time updates on task changes, comments, and team actions. Stay informed about project progress.
Custom Fields: Add custom metadata to cards for project-specific information. Tailor boards to your needs.
Archive & History: Archive completed tasks and view historical changes. Maintain project records over time.
Mobile Responsive: Access boards from any device with responsive web design. Manage tasks on the go.
Export Data: Export boards and tasks to various formats for backup or reporting. Own your project data.
Search & Filter: Find tasks quickly with advanced search and filtering options. Navigate large projects efficiently.
Notifications: Get alerts for task assignments, comments, and due dates. Stay on top of your work.
